alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 4:41PM MST until December 27 at 8:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .A clipper system will bring another inch or two of snow to northwest SD this evening. Winds will shift northwest this evening and remain gusty into Monday morning, with gusts to around 50 mph possible. This will lead to blowing and drifting snow in areas that have snow on the ground. In addition, the strong winds and bitterly cold temperatures below zero will allow wind chill readings of 25 to 35 below zero, late tonight into Monday morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Harding County, Butte County, Perkins County, Ziebach County and the Northern Meade County Plains. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach
